item.title: Asynchronous Web Scraping: Scaling For The Moon!
item.description: Asynchronous programming can speed up web scrapers astronomically and is by far the most important scaling step when dealing with big projects. What exactly is it, how does it work, and what are the best ways to take advantage of it?
item.dc:creator: Bernardas Ališauskas

item.title: Introduction To Reverse Engineering The Web
item.description: To efficiently scrape a web resource, understanding how it works and functions is often a vital step. Reverse engineering a website behavior is often first step when developing a web-scraper - let's take a look how!
item.dc:creator: Bernardas Ališauskas

item.title: Web Scraping Target Discovery
item.description: Target discovery in web-scraping is how the scraper explores target website to find scraping targets. For example to scrape product data of an e-commerce website we would need to find urls to each individual product. This step is called "discovery". What types of discovery methods are there?
item.dc:creator: Bernardas Ališauskas

item.title: Web Scraping Target Discovery: Crawling
item.description: The most common web scraping target discovery technique: recursive crawling. How does it work? What are the pros and cons and the most optimal execution patterns?
item.dc:creator: Bernardas Ališauskas

item.title: Web Scraping Target Discovery: Indexes
item.description: The most common web scraping target discovery technique: recursive crawling. How does it work? What are the pros and cons and the most optimal execution patterns?
item.dc:creator: Bernardas Ališauskas

item.title: Web Scraping Target Discovery: Search API
item.description: Fundamental web-scraping reverse-engineering technique is figuring out how website's search works. Replicating web search in web scraping is a great target discovery technique. Why, when and how should it be used effectively?
item.dc:creator: Bernardas Ališauskas

item.title: Web Scraping Target Discovery: Sitemaps
item.description: There are many techniques when it comes to discovery web-scraping targets. One of the most common ones is to use website sitemap indexes. What are they and to take advantage of them in web-scraping?
item.dc:creator: Bernardas Ališauskas
